title: DocValues page should explain terms like SORTED_SET, SORTED_NUMERIC
description:
docvalues.adoc

Unless you dive into the code, the difference between SORTED_SET, SORTED_NUMERIC etc aren't clear. The link to the javadocs is easy to overlook (or even know is important).

I'll update the Javadocs to include a very short explanation of each.

comments.content: I checked in a couple of tweaks as part of SOLR-12625
